website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy protector that covers both the front and back of the seat, although many felt the back kick mat is of lesser quality than the front.
pros: Made from a good polyester material, with super grip vinyl corners
Back kick mat has three organizer pockets
Has an adjustable strap to make it more secure
cons: While the front is sturdy, some buyers felt the back kick mat is of poorer quality overall
Some reports of the seat cover sliding too easily

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know kick seat protectors existed until my son told me about them after my three grandchildren tried very hard to not rub their little feet against the back of my new car's cloth seats. I found these online and saw the seat kick protector also came with a back seat protector as well. I was leery because the price was great but after reading the reviews decided to order. So glad I did now the kids can be kids and I won't be worrying they are ruining my cloth seats. I have a 2019 Chevy Equinox and they fit the seats great. Would definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protector! Easy to wipe down, the buckles pull nice and tight to the back of the seats, and overall it has a “clean” look to it. There is a nice thick rubber padding under the seat protector, which is unlike any other one I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. We've only had it for a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We've only had it for a few days but I would say that I definitely like that it was large enough to cover the seat well and the kick mat covers the front seat well. It also seems to be of good quality. We put it under a high back booster seat and our child can buckle the seat belt well. This was the main reason we bought a new one. The old one we had, slid all over the seat and covered the seat belt so we always had a difficult time with buckling the seat belt. My son even gives it a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Great product as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Honda Pilot 2019 and they fit perfectly, just what I was looking for. Easy to adjust and straps can be well hidden in the seats. I needed to take out the mats to remove the car seat and was thinking it would leave marks on the leather seats, none was found. Greatly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: IvonneT

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, easy, and USEFUL
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new car and wanted to protect the fabric seats. This car seat protector and kick mat are wonderful!! They were so easy to put in and install the car seat on top of it was unbelievable. And they already saved the seat from little muddy footprints because grandpa forgot to check shoes before helping my little one into the car and she likes to kick. The pockets on the kick mat are great for storing books and tissues and whatever else we need. So happy with this Lebogner duo!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These items are very impressive. Better than I expected actually. They fit great on both the car seat and the back of the front seat. The strap is adjustable on both for height. It's nice that they have pockets integrated as opposed to just a seat and seat back protector. After taking my daughter's car seat out recently and finding a huge MESS of treasure underneath even though I vacuum her actual seat regularly, I'd definitely recommend protecting your vehicle's seats with these. I thought we were pretty clean. Apparently, not so much. :)
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why i expected more but this set is poor quality. Cheap and light contruction and without side straps not good for toddlers. Pockets are functional but dont buy this with high hopes like i did... Update 7/9/18 As is the case with many sellers these days i was kindly asked to remove the negative review and offered a refund. I wrote the review because I honestly felt the product did not deserve the reviews it has received up to this point. To accept the refund and remove it would support a rating does not reflect the product. Please don't allow poor products to maintain high reviews. Some of us rely on honest reviews when making purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Why doesn't everyone use these?
customer_reviews.text: These are so much cheaper and easier to install than custom-made covers. In fact, there's no installation - you just buckle it around the headrest. I bought them for the two front seats of my new car. The back-of-the-seat protector came in handy when I had my small dog riding in the back seat today. She sat on the rear seat and put her paws on the back of the seats in front of her. It was nice not to have to worry about her nails. I will probably keep the covers on all the time, unless I'm asked to transport a dignitary (ha ha).
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: With 3 grandkids, these are a must. They were easy and simple to put on. We will seen how they old up to the wear and tear they will put them thru This week.
customer_reviews.author: ACSanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money! I just bought a brand new Chevy Traverse and want to protect the leather seats from the 4 grandkids. I bought one of these seat protectors to put under the toddler's car seat...fit perfectly and was easy to install. The first thing my granddaughter did when sitting in her car seat was put her feet up on the back of front seat...I was so glad that I put the other pocket protector on the back of my seat! I do wish there were more pockets and were larger, but overall it does it's job of protecting the seat. I will be buying more of this product to protect under the older kids' booster seats.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Product was what I expected. Great price & quick shipping. I purchased for my 2018 4Runner to cover leather seats. Fit just fine without any modifications. My child is in a backless booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: krenee

customer_reviews.title: Ripped before I ever even put my baby in the car seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is poor quality. I was careful to install it according to the directions but it still has a significant tear up by the strap. There was no significant strain on the strap or anything, I never even had the chance to put my newborn in it before it happened!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for newborn carseat
customer_reviews.text: Item is like described, but do not buy if you have an Infant car seat. I cannot use this product and use the hooks to clip in the seat. This would only work with a car seat that doesn’t need to be hooked in to the hooks under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Weeks

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the car seat-seat protecter but the seat-back organizer is nearly useless. It has a few tiny pockets on the top and the rest of it is wasted space. They could’ve sewn 15 more pockets/organizers on it but they didn’t. I am actually not even using it all. I didn’t return it because I needed the car seat – seat protector but I wouldn’t order the combo pack again.
customer_reviews.author: Lena B.

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son wouldn't stop kicking the back passenger seat, I ordered this on amazon and 2 days later its in my car! So far so good very quick and easy to install, I like the pockets up top we put snacks, toys and wipes in them. He hasn't been able to kick my seat and cover it in dirt. I will be installing the under the car seat mat soon to help protect my leather seats.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the quality of material, easy installation, neat look, good coverage. I recently installed this in my Civic. The car seat is in the center so I bought two sets to cover the seats on the sides. It instantly changed the look inside by covering the not so clean seats. It looks durable and way to clean by wiping. The kick mat is wide and covers the entire seat back. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: AFH

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new car and wanted to protect it and keep it nice. My boys are notorious for kicking the back on the seats and although I have bought two other brands in the past, I decided to give these a try. I loved that these came with the kick mats and the seat protectors. So far I'm really happy with this purchase. They were really easy to install and it's nice I was able to adjust the straps and cinch them to fit my car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: While I love the extra protection for the back of the driver's seat. I really wish the actual cover for the car seat was bigger. It barely covers the area of my seat where the car seat is placed.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Chas

customer_reviews.title: Very good seat protector.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new car and when I moved the car seat over it was a mess! I was surprised just how much stuff could fall under a car seat that is supposed to lay flat on the seat 😳 I ordered this and so far it’s awesome. Car seat does not slide and offers full protection of my leather seats. The toy storage also comes in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It was a snap to set it in place, probably less than 2 minutes. The coverage it has is large so that my active 6 year old grandson would be pressed to stain the seats. As we approach winter the kick pad will prevent the wet winter boots from making a mess on the seat back in front. It was a very convenient feature that both pieces came together as a pair. The product quality it excellent. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NancyVt

customer_reviews.title: Not a consistent product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this since the first one I purchased that all compartments as the one shown in the picture. Sadly, the second one was totaly different and had none of the compartments as the first one and the pictures. Only theee little pockets where you can barely fit a small toy.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Arriaza Botto

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the car seats clean.
customer_reviews.text: I have two small grandkids that we keep when their parents are working. We take them with us when doing errands, it’s intend to the park. This helps keep the car seats from messing up our leather as well as keeping their feet off the back of the front seats. We were having to take their shoes off every time they rode with us before instead.
customer_reviews.author: steven w greeson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great combo, i was looking to protect the back of the front seat since my son put his feet up as soon as he sits on the kids car seat, but i found this one that comes with the protector for underneath his car seat. I havent used it that much since i got it for my weekends car and i got it on monday, bte great solution for my problem. works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: I bought one then bought the second one
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long enough to speak to the durability. However my granddaughter has sure given it the kick test. I bought the first one to see how well it would work, then bought the second. I am very happy with my purchase. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Came used!
customer_reviews.text: Item showed up in perfect condition until i opened the package. There are feet print on the piece that goes on the back of the seat. Like really... i requested another item & have to return this one- but that doesnt help me now when i just got a new car yesterday and need to protection, thats why i over nighted it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: With a three year old grandson we needed something to protect our seat and the rear of the front seat facing the booster. We have had a terrible winter here in KC and its hard to keep the seats clean with a 3yr old climbing in and out. This has done the job and exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Domenic in KC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for week 1/2 so far so good, easy to install. placed a towel underneath since some reviews said it left print marks or melted to leather seats.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is good for what’s it’s made to do. I like that it comes with a protector for the back of the driver seat. Some of the threading is coming loose on the back seat protector but for the price I didn’t expect it to last forever. So far it’s working as is should and protecting both my seat and my little ones
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the money. Unfortunately, the seat in my 2018 Mazda CX 5 are too tall for the top part of the seat cover. I've made it work since my child is still in a full booster seat. The cover for the back of the seat is great! I love all of the storage and it protects the seat from scuffs and dirt marks when my child is getting in his booster. Honestly, not all seats are the same size and I can't use that against the company. It's a great product and only really need it till my child is out of the booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: JRae

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: This item serves its purpose. I wish it were a little longer. Granddaughter faces backwards and still kicks the seat at times. Grandson faces forward and his feet still hits the seat. But this does serve its purpose. The part that goes on the back of the front seats is great but doesn't fit snug. Overall going to save dirty seats in new car.
customer_reviews.author: raven1462

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a new vehicle and with 2 active grandchildren (toddlers) wanted something that would look nice yet be functional when the car seats are out. The Lebogner Car seat protectors (I bought 2) have been easy to use, functional and attractive. In fact my daughter liked them so well she bought some also!
customer_reviews.author: Pat D.

customer_reviews.title: Not grippy at all!
customer_reviews.text: The car seat pads are not grippy so it makes the car seats slide around (even under the weight of a heavier car seat). My sons car seat was installed properly, but it has a level on it, and the car seat keeps sliding and making the level go to red, so this definitely created a safety issue. I had to return these.
customer_reviews.author: DSDMD

customer_reviews.title: Convenient protection for your car while using car seats!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how you could attach the seat back protector to the headrest-no more slipping down when you are putting the car seat back in. Also, the protector for little kicking legs is a great idea to protect marks on the seat in front of them. I haven't used it yet with my grandson so that's why I only gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dierker

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because every aspect was so much better than I thought it would be. My one and only complaint is that I wish the part that goes under the bottom of the car seat was a little wider as once you tighten the car seat down, it lifts a little so when food is dropped in the seat, the crumbs sometimes fall under the mat. But it is very durable, easy to clean and made well!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover a leather seat that had some slices and wear. Not using it with a child or car seat, but found the product to be great for what I needed. VERY easy to install, and the storage pockets will be handy. Thanks for making a great product and delivering it promptly!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Car seat protector
customer_reviews.text: I like this product aside from the anti-slip lining underneath. I feel that given time, it will eventually start peeling of and sticking to the leather seat. That is why it only get 4 stars. We will have to see how the lining pans out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, Easy installation, Great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for each car. So far, we've only installed the car seat protector piece in daddy's truck. We didn't see the need to install the kick mat portion while he is still rear facing. As for quality, it's very nice and very sturdy and it couldn't be easier to install. Baby is due in 7 days so yesterday we took the truck to have them check the car seat installation. The fireman even commented on how nice the seat protector was and how it still allowed for safe install of the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as for under my sons cars seat and it works great still use it to this day I also love the additional one that goes on the back of the seat and has holder sgreat deal!
customer_reviews.author: jamie Nicole leach

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: With 2 dogs and 4 grandkids, I need covers that WORK This is finally the right product. Super easy to install (and remove). Backing keeps mud and liquids from getting through to the seat covers. I am ordering another set as soon as a I finish this review!!
customer_reviews.author: YiayiaKathe

customer_reviews.title: Bought one then bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my toddler and it works great and looks decent considering what it is for. I bought another one for my soon to be toddler. The only drawback was that the one that covers the seat does not extend all the way up to the headrest as shown in picture. This is not a big deal for us because the point was to keep the seat clean from dirty shoes/feet which it covers enough of the seat back for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jcs

customer_reviews.title: Catches the 6 year olds dirt!
customer_reviews.text: The kick pad was really quick to install. I bought it to use to protect the back side of my driver seat and where my 6 year old sits in the back seat. I just got a new car and want to preserve the material longer! I’ve been using it for about a week and half now. It’s caught all her crumbs and dirt to date so I’m happy with the purchase! The price compared to others is pretty good too. I would recommend it to my mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dana R

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended seat protector
customer_reviews.text: I got two of those for my family car -- a must have if you have kids -- the anti slip backing does the job and makes the cover very stable -- they are very simple looking and bend well with our car's black interior
customer_reviews.author: Alaa

customer_reviews.title: small, light weight material
customer_reviews.text: I 've bought several seat protectors, this one is average at best. Too small to fully cover a full sized seat. light weight material. Probably wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Good sized car seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to place under my daughter’s booster seat and protect the seats in our new car. My daughter loves the compartments that she can stash a few toys and books in and I love that they are easy to install and protect the seats. The straps and fasteners feel a little cheap but everything has stayed intact so far.
customer_reviews.author: Linglou

customer_reviews.title: Makes my Mommy life easier...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this car seat protector. I just got a new car and have a 2 year old who loves snacking on our car rides :) This protector keeps my car clean and any crumbs that can potentially fall in between the seat cracks fall directly on the protector and I am able to clean it up so easily. I also love all the small pocket compartments to keep wipes, toy cars and essentials I need to keep handy...no more digging through diaper bag!!! YAY! super simple to install and even easier to wipe down and clean. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality seat covers
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with these two carseats for two reasons: 1. Price 2. They fit perfect on the new Highlander!
customer_reviews.author: ANGELINA OROZCO

customer_reviews.title: Well made, perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It's a well made product that fits the back seat of our vehicle. The kick mat and matching front seatback cover are great additions.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great material - thin but strong, full coverage, adjustable straps allow for easy and accurate install. Have used for a couple of months over a few thousand miles of road trips. Our black labs jump into the seats any chance they get and these have held up nicely so far! Would have liked more/larger pockets on lower back side but assume it may have hung heavy if that were the case.
customer_reviews.author: cheraevie

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good
customer_reviews.text: It is not exactly as pictured- it did not come with the mesh pockets that go under the kids’ feet. But everything else is accurate. I feel that it was a bit overpriced and the constant emails asking for reviews are annoying but I’m satisfied with the product for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Wish the booster seat cover was longer.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but I wish the back part of the child booster seat cover was a bit longer. It covers just half of the back seat. The kick mat is wonderful, covers the whole back of the front seat.
customer_reviews.author: danithemagus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and fits snug
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new SUV with leather seats and need these for my two messy kids! They took 5 minutes to install and fit snugly up against the drivers seat as well as provide good coverage for my kids seats. So far they are great. I have only had them for a few weeks, but my 3 year old kicks the back of my chair constantly and it is holding up great. I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: amazonmom1

customer_reviews.title: East to use, lots of pockets and protects seats under carseats.
customer_reviews.text: This is great to hang over the back of seat to keep odds and ends, toys, water, ect. The cover is great because it has the long kick mat so dirty little feet don't mess up the seat.
customer_reviews.author: JGordonNo1Fan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the item, so I don't know yet how easy it is to clean or how durable it is. However, it looks good and it was very easy to install. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Heintze

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as stated in the online product description. I am satisfied and you will be to great buy and great price.
customer_reviews.author: deland

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for my nissan pathfinder
customer_reviews.text: It fitted my 2017 Nissan Pathfinder it has leather seats and it a really good protection for my car i have a daughter and she still needs a baby chair and this product protects my leather seats thumbs up for that 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Thania Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Great find for rear facing car seat kids!
customer_reviews.text: Snagged this gem to help protect the seats of my new Subaru from my son who is still rear facing. It’s a huge help to not have to take his shoes off before getting him in and then putting them back on getting out. The rubber backing helps to keep it in place too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy more
customer_reviews.text: Great kick protection for the back of the passenger seat and the seat cover keeps food from getting ground into the seat under the carseat. Great deal for both too!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great it comes with Kick Mats!
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased and so far it’s great for covering up our leather in our new SUV, especially the kick mats. We purchased 2. We still put a blanket underneath for the space between the 2 car seats as kids still manage to get crumbs and stuff everywhere, but the point of still getting this protector is that it also covers the back of the seat the car seat is sitting on. Glad both car seat protectors and kick mats have pockets of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my new car before making a recent long trip with my daughter and two year old grandson. Unfortunately with the design of the headrest for my back seat it didn't quite fit as designed but we still installed it the best we could while covering as much of the seat as possible. The cover for the back of the front seat worked great and was worth the purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for it’s price
customer_reviews.text: The seat protector is great. I do wish it was a bit less flimsy as the corners fold if you put any items inside the pockets. But overall versy easy to install and great for its price. Super convenient as my son can now reach the pockets from his car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Chul Lee

customer_reviews.title: Thin material not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material. This has a towel layer. Wanted something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised and seems to be of good quality. I've only had it for a few
customer_reviews.text: It covers my backseat keeping it clean. It works as advertised and seems to be of good quality. I've only had it for a few days
customer_reviews.author: JHines

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and well made
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I have two rough boys and this saves the seats from wear (from their car seat and booster seat)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: easy, good looking, functional
customer_reviews.text: more than easy to install (I did it while keeping an eye on my kid and holding a coffee in one hand). It covers exactly what needed protection from kicking feet and dropped crumbs, looks way better than the old tshirt and bunched up towel I was using before, provides much easier access to the seat belt latches, and my kid loves the pockets too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I could complain and say I hate how they flap around when I roll the windows down without the car seats, but I’m just glad they’re not sticking to my seats to ruin! Very good product and when car seats are in place it does a fantastic job. I have a 2018 Honda Pilot. Fits very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Corneycakes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the purchase. It looks great and fits perfect in my Toyota Corolla. My son likes to put his feet on the front seat so it helps keep it clean. I would totally purchase this again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Awdryy

customer_reviews.title: Covers seat, could be a little thicker for car seats
customer_reviews.text: Protects the back of the seat when using a car seat. Only thing that could make it better would be to make it thicker so that the car seat bottom doesn't leave impressions in the upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I loved it a lot. My only complaint is the kick guard isnt black like the seat protector. I bought these because they appear black and so are my seats so they matched. But it's lovely and seems durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna Ridgdill Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping vehicle seats clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Saves wear and tear on the seats of my vehicle. I bought one for my husband s vehicle too. Easy to install, keeps seats cleaner
customer_reviews.author: janetp

customer_reviews.title: Great seat protector!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this seat protector. It was very easy to set up and you can't see the straps on the front seat. I'm hoping it'll last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item ahead of my baby being born. I have only installed it this far but it seems like a pretty solid item.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Caito

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this product is that the material is nicely made. It’s very easy to install and adjust. It has somewhat this rubber grip to it so it won’t slide around. It is exactly as the picture shown. I purchased it because it’s to the point product. It does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Santana

customer_reviews.title: gift for 2nd granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my daughter in law. She already has these for her 2 year old daughter and needed them for the newborn.
customer_reviews.author: fritzikay

customer_reviews.title: High Quality & Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2016 Honda Odyssey and it fit our seat just fine. For the price, it is very high quality. It installed very easily with minimal fuss.
customer_reviews.author: DragonLord

customer_reviews.title: The depth of your seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2012 GMC Terrain to use on the back seat. It does cover the seat perfectly to protect the leather interior. However the compartment that is intended to hang of the bottom of the seat to store things is un usable. I believe the base of my seat is a little too deep. Having said that, it still protects my seat and that is what I needed the most.
customer_reviews.author: BDW

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: They are of good quality, only thing I wish is that the kick guards had a big pocket. It covers up the one in my seat and none of the ones that are exposed are very big.
customer_reviews.author: Devonator

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is a very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: This set came quickly and was packed well. The only thing I didn't realize is that there is no middle cut out for the seat anchor. Other than that it is a very nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cover
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover works, however, I was hoping there would be a little more padding to help prevent indentations on the seat. Also I hoped the pockets on the Kick mat were a bit wider. You can't fit much in the mesh pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects your car from rambunctious kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter nannies a young boy with some behavioral issues and this product stands up to his punishment. She has a Lincoln SUV and it fits her seat like a glove. It's tough material and covers all the spots he hits perfectly. If you value your car and have children, this is for you. Well made and blends in to her dark gray interior perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: James Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: the seat protector is great. Keeps the car seats free of dropped food and crumbs from kids eating in car. The back of seat protector is great for kids putting their headphones, crayons, etc so they can easily reach them
customer_reviews.author: kly

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2016 Honda Pilot Elite Fairly Well
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this on my wife's 2016 Honda Pilot Elite. Installation was pretty simple and easy. For the most part, the kick mat hugs the driver's seat pretty well, and the straps hide easily. The material seems a little thin, so hard to say how durable it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps leather seats clean.
customer_reviews.text: I order this set to protect my Leather seats in my Lexus. I have a grandchild that likes to kick the back of the seats. She loves the pockets for her toys and I like that they work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Fits perfect in my Kia Soul
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Fits perfect in my Kia Soul. I brought two of these. Now i don’t have worry about the car seats leaving a mark in my seats or worry about the kids feet print on the back of my seats. The seller had great customer service and made sure i didn’t have any issues with the product.
customer_reviews.author: DaSh

customer_reviews.title: Work well and protect great
customer_reviews.text: I just got a car with tan seats and wanted to keep them clean with my 3 yr old granddaughter. They work great protecting the back of the seat where her feet often hit plus keep any spills contained on the seat cover. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Protect your car from toddler messes
customer_reviews.text: Great producer fits both areas perfectly in my LEXUS RX. Covers the necessary space n easy to install. Will purchase again for hubbys car
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.title: Car seat protector
customer_reviews.text: This car seat protector seems fantastic..especially when my grandson decides to kick the back of my seat in my brand new vehicle!..love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Houck

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I put this product under my grandson's car seat in my new car. I love it because his feet are always kicking back and forth and the Kick Mat helps to protect my seat and the Seat Back Protector protects the front seat from those flailing shoes! I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: Fits Jeeps
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a Jeep rubicon and it fits the seats very well. It’s easy to instal and easy to move if needed. I can put my seats down without having to take it off like some other products I’ve come across.
customer_reviews.author: Chorrace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like seat cover will work just fine. Kick mat is a great addition 2 a seat cover
customer_reviews.author: Danny L. Clayborn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I like it I have recently purchased a Ford Eco Sport and my child was constantly kicking the seat in front of him , I have black leather seats so it showed badly, the protection is soooo nice, also the car seat cover for his booster seat it's perfect and super easy to install , awesome for the price 😍
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if u plan on using with car seat it’s saftey issue and car seat won’t sinch down
customer_reviews.text: Safety centers will not let u install this with you car seat it is a safety hazards waste of money and was to big for my car seat also
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product. Fits my 2016 Hyundai Santa Fe Sport ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Fits my 2016 Hyundai Santa Fe Sport SUV seat perfectly. I purchased this to install under my grandson's car seat to protect the seats. It fits very well and appears to be very well made and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: protecting my seats from a 2yo
customer_reviews.text: good protection for seats, has tons of pockets for small things, a bit overpriced but should last forever
customer_reviews.author: Esenbek

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to order because the ratings weren’t as good as some other companies, but I totally satisfied with the product. The only thing I would suggest improving is the piece that goes around the headrest. It tends to loosen over time, which is not big deal at all. It really is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Wat cheaper than buying a new seat!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my new truck to protect it from my little monster of a child. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: its me

customer_reviews.title: Keeps seats clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my new car because 4 years of kids had left quite the mark when it was time to sell my old one. This does a great job of protecting the seats from my kids climbing in and kicking the seats, both front and rear facing. My daughter loves having the pockets to put stuff in, which also keeps the backseat neater.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to protect my car seat. I have a 6 year old grandson who loves to kick the back of the car seat when he is in the car. The set was well made. The material was little bit thinner than I had hoped for, but still very good. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chu

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: excellent fit and ease of install... a must have have to save your seats from the little crumb crunchers!
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I wish the mat that goes under the car seat was a little larger, but it seems to work great and I am happy with it and the kick mat that protects the back of my seat.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Fits well in my Prius. I can see how it’ll keep the seats clean with a child. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

product_meta.title: lebogner Car Seat Protector + Kick Mat Auto Seat Back Protector with 3 Organizer Pockets, Durable Quality Seat Covers + Waterproof Kick Guards to Protect Your Leather and Upholstery Seats from Damage
product_meta.description:
Does it seem to you that it’s not possible to keep the upholstery of your car nice when you have small children?
Does your child’s car seat constantly leave dirt and marks on the seat of your car that are impossible to remove?
Need some storage space to put your child's toys handy?
Tired of your car seats getting dirty, muddy, and scratched?

The Lebogner Car Seat Protector + Kick Mat With Pockets is the answer!!!

No more having a ripped car seat or endless washing and scrubbing trying to remove the dirt or spending money on a professional cleaning service!


Benefits Of Buying The LEBOGNER Car Seat Protector + Kick Mat With Organizer Pockets… 

Car Seat Protector
★ Customized design fits on the seat of Most Vehicles.
★ Designed with super grip vinyl corners to prevent your baby's forward or rear facing car seat from slipping.
★ Can be fastened to the seat headrest with an adjustable strap for a secure fit.
★ Designed to stay permanently secure in one position with the super anti slip backing.
★ 2 Handy access mesh pockets under the baby's feet for kids travel necessities.
★ Stylish black design that will suit any car interior.
★ Premium high-quality 600D polyester material for a good look and super long life. 

Kick Mat
★ Customized design fits the entire back seat of Most Vehicles. Measuring 19" Wide x 27" Long.
★ They fasten to the back of your seat with two attachment points at the top and bottom for a secure fit.
★ Premium high-quality polyester material.
★ Water-resistant, machine-washable fabric for easy care.
★ 3 organizer pockets on the front for handy storage of food or kids play toys.
★ Protect the back of your vehicle seats from dirt and liquids.

Order Includes 1 Car Seat Protector And 1 Kick Mat.
feature_bullets: ✓ Our Car Seat Protector Is Made Out Of Durable Material To A Very High Standard Which Gives The Car Seat Protector A Super Long Life. Easy To Wipe Clean. Simple And Easy To Install With The One Piece Design, And No Worry To Keep Track On Spare Parts.

✓ Our Car Seat Protector is designed with super grip vinyl corners to prevent your baby's forward or rear facing car seat from slipping, And super anti slip backing to prevent the car seat protector from slipping on your leather or cloth seat, Which makes sure your baby is safe at all times even with smooth slippery leather car seats.

✓ Our Kick Mat Measures 19" wide x 27" long, Has double layered fabric that will keep your Car Seats Clean even with the most active little feet in your car seat. And will instantly protect your upholstery or leather car seats from Scuff Marks, Moisture, and Dirty Footprints. The Kick Mats are water resistant, machine washable, or easy wipes clean that will give your Kick Mats a Super Long Life and Always Look Good.

✓ Our Kick Mat includes 3 organizer pockets on the front for handy storage of food, kids play toys, colouring and reading books, baby gear and accessories. Ensure that the things that are important are in reach of your kids at all times, and that the mess rolling around the floor is limited. Simple and Easy to Install, Takes less than a minute with the long enough adjustable top and bottom buckle straps. The bottom strap remains tucked under the seat back so the driver and passenger don't feel i
